title: The Genesis Key
description: Fans of James Rollins, Dan Brown, Michael Crichton, Steve Berry, David Baldacci, and Raymond Khoury, listen James Barney is among us! A remarkable new master bursts upon the scene with The Genesis Key —a gripping debut thriller that combines a breathtaking Da Vinci Code -like historical/religious conspiracy with the science-gone-mad terror of Jurassic Park. A brilliant biologist finds herself at the center of a heart-racing international race to unlock the secret to life itself in James Barney’s electrifying, page-turning hunt for The Genesis Key .
author: James Barney
